title: Looking for T206 Newspaper Ads- WILL PAY TOP $
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Looking for T206 Newspaper Ads- WILL PAY TOP $
posts.post_content:
Posted By: DB
I am looking for newspaper ads from 1909 - 1911 depicting the T206 baseball cards in Hindu, Old Mill, Piedmont, Sweet Corporal ads. I have seen these in newspapers in Virginia, New Orleans, Atlanta etc. If anyone has any of the advertisements and would be will to part with them please send me an email at kilaartist@aol.com and possibly some scans of the articles. Thanks

Doug
